text:
DEPARTMENT OF
HEALTH, EDUCATION, AND WELFARE
OFFICE OF EDUCATION
WASHINGTON^, D. C. 20202
July 26, 1963
Mrs. Dee Wolfarth
6105 Woody Laos
Minneapolis, Minnesota 55421
Dear Dee:
Thank you for your letter announcing dates of the next meeting
of our committee. Unfortunately, it will not be possible for
me to attend and I will leave it to you to cancel the room
reservation which you have made for me.
Inasmuch as the supplement to the contract is far from being
complete, there will be some delay in getting final approval.
I believe that Jim Fellows has already written you about the
matter including the possibility of a postponement of the
meeting. I share his opinion but it will be up to him and
Clair to make the final decision. If it is postponed, I sinÂ¬
cerely hope it cen be scheduled for s time when I can be free
to be with you.
Best wishes always.
Sincerely yours.
cc: Mr. Clair Tettemer
Mr. James Fellows ,
(Mrs.) Gertrude G. Broderick
Educational Media Specialist
